message.body: he will be utd witht the others
5 but if u buy ur own grain it is $450. lmk what u would like to do. also can u pick up an equimax wormer for him. i just wormed last week and that way
Ok! I'll be out soon with his records. I'll bring my grain, and I can pick up a wormer today & give it to him - thanks. Can he meet the other horses over the fence today?
Sure this afternoon he can after i bring in one of the fields
Ok thanks! I left his coggins etc. in the tack room (I'll bring copies Tuesday after I'm in the office). Be back this afternoon.
